titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the definition of the term "non-resident" used by the Internal Revenue Service.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/18/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Internal Revenue Service should define a "non-resident" as any person whose permanent principal, actual dwelling place in fact is not the United States.
